sentences.en: A group of riders came into view on the dirt road.
sentences.cn: 一群骑车的人出现在那条土路上。

sentences.en: Do you know the highway to Tulsa? The airport road joins it.
sentences.cn: 你知道通向塔尔萨的公路吗？去机场的路和它交会。

sentences.en: From Wrexham centre take the Chester Road to the outskirts of town.
sentences.cn: 从雷克瑟姆市中心出发，沿着切斯特路到达市郊。

sentences.en: She could hear a clamour in the road outside.
sentences.cn: 她能听得见外面路上的吵闹声。

sentences.en: Such cars, however, do grip the road well, even in the dry.
sentences.cn: 不过，这种车即使在干燥路面上也表现出了良好的抓地性能。

sentences.en: The entrance is well signposted and is in Marbury Road.
sentences.cn: 入口处在马伯里路，有清晰的路标。

sentences.en: The main road continues towards Viterbo before turning right to Bolsena.
sentences.cn: 大路一直延伸到维泰博，之后右转通向博尔塞纳。

sentences.en: The road divides; you should take the right fork.
sentences.cn: 路在这里分了岔；你应该走右边一条。

sentences.en: The road safety programme is having a demonstrable effect on road users.
sentences.cn: 道路安全方案在道路使用者身上逐渐显现出明显的效果。

sentences.en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentences.cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentences.en: The side tracks off the tarred road were rutted and uneven.
sentences.cn: 柏油路面两边的辅道上布满车辙，凹凸不平。

sentences.en: The traffic on the approach road slowed to a crawl.
The truck lumbered across the parking lot toward the road.
sentences.cn: 卡车隆隆地驶过停车场准备上路。

sentences.en: The wide road was blocked solid with traffic that moved along sluggishly.
sentences.cn: 宽阔的马路被缓慢前行的车辆堵得严严实实。

sentences.en: They started strolling down the dusty road in the moonlight.
sentences.cn: 在月光下他们开始沿着满是尘土的路漫步。

words.tran_cn: 道路；路面；车行道；铁路的路基

phrases.phrase: in (或 out of) the (或 one's) road
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)挡（不挡）（某人的）路；妨碍（不妨碍）（某人）
(非正式)临回家之前喝的最后一杯饮料（尤指酒）
公路运输；铁路运输；陆路运输

phrases.phrase: take to the road (或 take the road)

trans.tran_en: a specially prepared hard surface for cars, buses, bicycles etc to travel on

trans.tran_cn: 在…设置路障，（狗）沿臭迹追逐（猎物），（狗）闻着臭迹追
